-log10(P[deletion_entry_exit]).description: Estimate of the probability of entering or exiting a deletion (transition probability).

-log10(P[maternal_crossover]).description: Estimate of the probability of a maternal crossover (transition probability).

-log10(P[paternal_crossover]).description: Estimate of the probability of a paternal crossover (transition probability).

-log10(P[hard_to_seq_region_entry_exit]).description: Estimate of the probability of entering or exiting a hard to sequence region (transition probability).
